title: BRIEF-Xylem Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.43
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:08 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Xylem Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.43 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - Xylem Inc:
* XYLEM REPORTS SEVEN PERCENT ORGANIC REVENUE INCREASE AND STRONG DOUBLE-DIGIT GROWTH IN 1ST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.43
* Q1 REVENUE $1.2 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.19 BILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.51 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $5.1 BILLION TO $5.2 BILLION
* ON AN ORGANIC BASIS, CONTINUES TO ANTICIPATE REVENUE GROWTH IN RANGE OF FOUR TO SIX PERCENT FOR FULL-YEAR 2018
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.92, REVENUE VIEW $5.16 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $2.82 TO $2.97 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
